Name: Brazilian Coffee
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Toddy glass .
BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: Strong coffee and plenty of sugar are essential in this Brazilian number.
Nutrition: One serving of Brazilian Coffee contains 206 calories
